about_the_game:
Blyx is a charming 2D pixel art platformer that invites players to explore a magical world filled with puzzles, classic platformer action, and exciting battles. In this game, you'll join the journey of Blyx, the main character, as he tries to figure out his purpose in a diverse and unique set of worlds.

As Blyx, you'll tackle tricky puzzles, jump between platforms, and face various enemies, including big bosses. Each level is full of challenges and surprises, promising an adventure at every turn.

Visit the quirky Cheese Kingdom, where a sad cheese king with a mysterious past awaits as the main villain. Or test your skills in the City of Riches, protected by a powerful dragon. These different and imaginative settings add depth and fun to the game, making it a great choice for platformer and pixel art fans.

Blyx combines an engaging story with fun gameplay, making it a must-try for anyone who loves action-adventure games. Dive into the colorful world of Blyx and help him uncover his true purpose in these exciting and varied realms.

  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2.1 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES

short_description: Blyx is a story-driven action-adventure game, where you can discover new worlds and fight with complex bosses. Solve interesting puzzles, jump between platforms, and battle enemies – all to help Blyx find his purpose among the realms.
